msbt.message: Oh! ! That was quick!Heh heh, thanks to you, I decided to move to this island and, uh Well, here I am, !A new home means a new workout plan, so get ready for it!I still have stuff to unpack, but I'll probably start my new program soon.You'd make a great workout bud, ! Think about it!

Oh! ! Yup, I live here starting today. Ready to get swole together?This place is great, but I shouldn't be surprised since you pointed me here. Thanks for the advice! I'll be busy unpacking today, but let's talk tomorrow, !
Yo, ! It's me! I moved to , just like I said I was gonna!I am SUPER pumped to get a new weight-training buddy!I'll be unpacking stuff all day today, but we have GOT to start lifting soon.

Ah! ! Thanks for the advice the other day!I left , just like I said I would, .I knew this had to be a good place if you recommended it, and so far, I really love my new jogging route! Who would've thought? You and me together on !

Yo! ! Surprised to see me?I moved here thanks to you, and so far everything's going great!Oh! I had a premonition We're gonna become super muscle legends on this little island. I can't wait!I'm sure I'll say it again, but thanks for spotting for me, .
Hey! !What's with the puzzled look, bud? I told you I was gonna move here!Ah! I can't wait to get a taste of that muscle soreness! Get ready to sweat, !

Oh! ! We finally meet up!You're the whole reason I moved here, but I hadn't seen you, so I thought maybe you moved away. I'm so glad I finally ran into you! We're gonna get the whole island sweatin', .
Oh ?I couldn't wait to swim over to this island after your glowing reviewButI'm not feeling too good right now HIYAACHOOOOO!Let's get together when I'm feeling better, .
Yo! ! Surprised to see me?Actually, I moved here because invited me.One look at those triceps and I knew I needed to take them seriously. Sosee you around, bud!

Heya, !Ha ha! You look surprised to see me! I moved here 'cause invited me.We're pretty much neighbors now, so don't be a stranger if you ever need a running buddy, .I'll be too busy unpacking to hang out today, but all bets are off tomorrow!

Oh, hey, . Good to see you!Your eyebrows are flexing like, "Why are you here?!" I guess I can't blame you for being surprised. convinced me to move here, .I'm a bit lost in all the new aerobics opportunities, but I'm sure you'll keep me grounded, right?
! It's me! ! From !Ha ha! You look so surprised! talked up this island, so I felt I had to move in.You and me? We're gonna be great buds here. Wellgreat buds and even greater rivals, !

Yo! ! Long time no see! Remember me?Whoa! Now THAT'S some eyebrow muscle! Your face totally says, "What's this guy doing here?"Actually, I moved here because made it seem like an awesome place to live.It's been pretty great so far. And since you'll be seeing me every day, maybe we can work out together!

Oh, is that you, ? Long Long time <10_10 />HIYAAACHOOOO!<10_9 />Heh heh. I ended up moving here because made it sound like a great placeWell, I'm pitching a cold I don't want you catching. Let's go for a run when I'm better, .

Yo! ! It's me, ! We met on .So I moved out here 'cause of a burly recommendation from one of your neighbors, .Looks like they don't live here anymore, though Guess they found a new spotter elsewhere.Oh well! I'm just glad you're still around. Take care!

Is that you, ?! We run into each other at last!Some local kept bragging about this place, so I lifted my stuff and here I am!Onlynow it looks they don't even live here anymore! I'm trying to decide how rude I think that is.Anyway, you're here, so I'm still happy with the move. See you around, !

Is that you, ? It's me, , from <10_10 /> HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />I moved here on a recommendation, but I've got a nasty cold right nowPlus, the athlete who convinced me to move doesn't even live here now. I was kind of at a loss, .But I feel better knowing you're here. Tell you what—I'll be your spotter after I ditch this cold. Deal?
Yo! ! Didn't take YOU long to come see me.I'm back on !Anyway, I'm still unpacking my stuff, so no workouts today.But just THINK of all the strength training we can do together now, !

! Remember me? It's ! I used to live here, but I moved away.Well, I'm back as of a few days ago.So whaddaya think about the new- and-improved ? My muscles look bigger, right?I plan on starting a whole new workout routine on this island, so get ready for it, !

Huh? It's , right?It's been a while. I used to live on this island. Name's Name's HIYAAACHOOO!Ugh Sorry. Guess I shouldn't have gone jogging in the rain.I don't want you to catch this cold, so please stop by when I'm better.

Yo! ! It's me! ! We met on .Surprised? I followed you all the way here to .Hahaha! I'm only kidding. But since we're neighbors, I do have your back. I'll spot you anytime! I'll finish unpacking tomorrow, I think. Maybe after that, we can work out together, .

Heeeey, !You OK? You're giving me that "what're they doing on this island" look. Yeah, I get that a lot. Check this out I moved to ! Whaddaya think? Surprised? Stoked? I bet it's both.Well, don't sprain your excitement! You're gonna need that energy for our workouts, !
Yo! ! Remember me?? From ? Long time, no chat. I just moved here the other day, but I'm happy I ran into you.We'll be seeing a lot of each other from now on, so get those chat muscles toned up, !

Heya, ! It's me, !I moved to from the other day. You pumped? I'm pumped.Heh heh, living on the same island as you is like a dream come true for me. I needed a good workout buddy!We share an island now, so we're literally in it together!
Oooof Wait, are you ?It's me, from <10_10 /> HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />I guess swimming here wasn't my best idea. Think I caught a coldI'll get better soon, so let's hang out then, .

Yo! ! Remember me? If not my face, then at least my bulging biceps must ring a bell.So yeah, as a refresher, the name's . As of today, I'm the new hero of .We're gonna get along great, I can already tell. Your gains will reach a whole new level, !

Hm? Oh! You're , yeah? I thought you looked familiar.It's me, ! I moved here in search of fellow leaders in the muscle space.Between the two of us, this island will be in the best shape of its life in no time, !

Huh? Wait Is that you, ? It's me, !IACHOO! Yikes, that was a doozy. Anyhow, I'm living here now. I'm not usually this drippy, though.I thought I was made of healthier stuff, but hey, maybe this will buff up my immune system's muscles.

Oh! ! That was quick!Heh heh, thanks to you, I decided to move to this island and, uh Well, here I am, !A new home means a new workout plan, so get ready for it!I still have stuff to unpack, but I'll probably start my new program soon.You'd make a great workout bud, ! Think about it!

Oh! ! We finally meet up!You invited me here when we talked at the campsite, but I hadn't seen you, soI thought maybe you left. I'm so pumped I finally ran into you! We're gonna get this whole island sweatin', .

Oh! Hey, . Good to see you!Your eyebrows are flexing like, "Why are you here?!" I guess I can't blame you for being surprised.I ran into over at the campsite, and I got convinced to move here, .Well, I'm a little lost in all my new aerobics opportunities, but I'm sure you'll keep me grounded, right?

! Hey, it's me, ! Ha ha! You look super surprised.I ran into , who talked this island up big-time at the campsite. And here I am!You and me? We're gonna be great buds here. Wellgreat buds and even greater rivals, !

Yo! ! Long time no see! Remember me?Whoa! Now THAT'S some eyebrow muscle! Your face totally says, "What's this guy doing here?"Well, I'm here 'cause I ran into at the campsite, and got sold on moving here.Lives up to the hype so far! And hey, since you'll be seeing me every day, maybe we can work out together!

Oh, is that you, ? Long Long time <10_10 />HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />Heh heh. I ended up moving here because hyped it up at the campsiteWell, I'm pitching a cold I don't want you catching. Let's go for a run when I'm better, .

Yo! ! It's me, , !OK, so I met one of your neighbors at the campsite, and they gave this place a big, burly recommendation.But now that I've moved, they don't even live here anymore! Maybe they found a new spotter elsewhereOh well! I'm just glad you're still around. Take care!

Is that you, ?! We run into each other at last!So I was at the campsite when I met some -er who kept bragging about this place.I liked what I heard, so as soon as I got home, I lifted all my stuff and now here I am!Exceptit looks like that athlete doesn't even live here anymore! Kinda rude, right?Anyway, you're here, so I'm still happy with the move. See you around, !

Is that you, ? It's me, How's it g— <10_10 />HIYAACHOOO!<10_9 />Ugh. I moved on a recommendation I got while at the campsite, but I caught a nasty cold when I arrivedPlus, the athlete who convinced me to move doesn't even live here now. I was kind of at a loss, .But I feel better knowing you're here. Tell you what—I'll be your spotter after I ditch this cold. Deal?

What's up! Remember me? It's , !Thanks for inviting me to move here. That campsite was awesome, but it was missing all my workout gear.I mean, I carried it with me—good strength training—but I just didn't feel right setting it all up there.Anyway, let me know if you ever wanna get a workout in!

Yo! It's me, ! How are you, ?So here I am. at last! I gotta say, I was PUMPED to get your invite at the campsite.Tell you what. You ever need to move something heavy, you call me. I'll be there, no questions asked.
What's up, ? Great to see you, !Thanks to your campsite invite, I am now 's biggest star!Let me know if you ever feel like some , alright?
Hey, ! Thanks for spotting for me at the campsite the other day.Anyway, like I promised, I'm all moved into . We should start training soon!Our bench weights aren't gonna know what hit 'em, !

Hey, ! Long time, no see, !Thanks a bunch for talking to me over at the campsite the other day. I'm all moved in now!Plus, I scouted out a great spot for my place. It's central to at least jogging routes that I know of!

What's up, ? Great to see you, !Check it out! I'm finally moved in. Thanks for inviting me over at the campsite. That was swole of you.And now it's my turn to invite YOU! If you ever wanna swim laps around the island, come by any time!

You're Wow! It's been a while!You remember me, right? We met at the campsite. You invited me to live here, .Then we did sit-ups, teamed up to lift a mountain, crushed some boulders, and juggled a few trees.Or, uhthat might've just been a REALLY cool dream I had.Dream or not, it just means our epic moon battle either WAS awesome, or WILL BE awesome.

Oh, . Glad you came by, .I've been meaning to thank you for inviting me to cto come liliv— <10_10 />HIYAAAACHOOO<10_9 />live here.Ugh I guess I caught a cold at the campsite. Why don't you come back when I'm feeling better

Hey, what's up, new lifting buddy?So I was at the campsite when mentioned some heavy stuff that needed lifting.Now, I am ALL about lifting. As soon as I got home, I lifted up my stuff and then put it down here.So come back once I'm unpacked, and we can help lift stuff together, !

Hey! Long time, no see!So I was doing some campsite calisthenics when asked me to be their rival.Nobody ever asks ME to be THEIR rival! So yeah, I had to take 'em up on that, .As soon as I finish unpacking, it's gonna be ON!

What's up, ! Been a while, !A cool thing happened when I was at the campsite. invited me to come live here!I'm still trying to come up with a way to thank 'em Oh! I'll lead 'em through a week of leg days!

Yo! ! Remember me? Great to see you!So, I was roughing it at the campsite when hit me with an offer to move here.Well, I wasn't about to turn THAT down. I mean, just look at everyone's triceps here! You're my kind of folks!

Whoa! Haven't seen you in a while! How have you been?So challenged me to a sprint race at the campsite, .Amazingly, I lost. But then I got invited to live here so I could train with 'em! Isn't that cool?Anyway, glad I finally ran into you!

<10_10 />HIYAAAAAACHOOOOOOO!<10_9 />Ugh The world pitched a cold and I went out and caught it. Go me. Anyway Hey, .So asked me if I wanted to move while I was at the campsite, .I got so pumped that I swam all the way home to pack andyeah. Not my b— HIYAACHOO! Not my best ideaYou know what? Let's punt on talking for now. We'll hang out once I'm feeling better.

What is up, ! It's me, ! Awesome to see you!So I was over at the campsite when someone convinced to move here by doing an awesome handstand.Except now I hear they moved away. I guess they're off training for the Handstand World ChampionshipsOh well! Maybe the two of us can start our own handstand league and lure them back, !

If it isn't ! How have you been?So get this I was out at the campsite when someone invited me to move out here.I thought, "Cool, I'm in!" and then I said, "Cool, I'm in!" and went home to pack.But NOW it looks like whoever invited me packed up and moved. Not cool! Foul ball! Offsides! Red card!Well, I'm here, I need a new workout buddy, and you're pretty built, so Whaddaya say, ?

You're , right? It's me, . How are y— HIYAAAACHOOO! UghNot only am I sick, but the one that invited me to move when I was at the campsite isn't here anymore.I think I'd be angry if there was room in my head for anything other than snot, .Well, let's hang out after I muscle my way through this, .
